name: GPG20T2-DiveLads
description:
This is a student project made in Unity, by programming studios at SAE Melbourne, As the project was a Programming studio and not a Design studio, The gameplay and visuals were low priority and the Systems and programming were the focus.

The project was not based on the popular game by a similar name...
The project was in fact initially based off some marble madness mechanics...
We had already gotten more than half way through the project before That other game was released... Upon which point we thought it would be funny to make a random name generator supplied with synonyms based on that other game....

The project features
custom Steering behaviour system
Custom path finding algorithm
network multiplayer using Mirror for Unity.
Waypoint movement
